## MapView.lookAt() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use lookAt version with \[\[LookAtParams\]\] object parameter.
> 

The method that sets the camera to the desired angle (`tiltDeg`<!-- -->) and `distance` (in meters) to the `target` location, from a certain heading (`headingAngle`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lookAt(target: GeoCoordLike, distance: number, tiltDeg?: number, headingDeg?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | [GeoCoordLike](./harp-geoutils.geocoordlike.md) | The location to look at. |
|  distance | number | The distance of the camera to the target in meters. |
|  tiltDeg | number | The camera tilt angle in degrees (0 is vertical), curbed below 89deg  0 |
|  headingDeg | number | The camera heading angle in degrees and clockwise (as opposed to yaw)  0 starting north. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
